website_summaries.verdict: The ON Cloudster is a reliable shoe that works best on trainings and on endurance runs, yet some runners prefer to use it on marathons as well. The features of this shoe are perfectly suited for runners who want exceptional cushioning, solid arch support, and protection for a more cloud-like feel. The springy effect of the sole offers a more responsive ride for a more enjoyable run. The price of this shoe is indeed worth the quality and performance it offers.
pros: A cloud-like, springy feel is what some runners say regarding the Cloudster
The heel cushioning is beyond expectations according to some testers
The fit of the upper is superb as quite a number of runners complimented it
Takeoff and landing in the On Cloudster is enjoyable, according to some testers
Dependable performance that provided the needs of many runners
cons: Some runners complained of the boring colors
Some runners complained of the stiffness

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to love these. I have a pair of ON Cloudrunners ...
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love these. I have a pair of ON Cloudrunners that are just the bees knees. I liked the color a lot, and I like to rotate my shoes, so I thought these would be a good second pair. While they fit the foot just fine, the heel cup was about an inch shorter than on the Cloudrunners. Every time I would take a step, the shoe slid off of my heel - would have made for some AMAZING blisters. I returned these and bought another pair of Cloudrunners.
customer_reviews.author: V. Miller

customer_reviews.title: changed by game
customer_reviews.text: These shoes transformed me from a heavy footed slogger to someone who actually enjoys running. They took away the leg, knee, all over pain I was having post runs (which was making me rethink my choice of activity) and gave me the freedom to lace up and go. They look unusual but not in a bad way at all. I love love love these shoes and will go back to this brand when I wear these out ---- in about another 100 miles!
customer_reviews.author: RunDMC505

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to love these. The color is fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love these. The color is fantastic, and the cushioning for an under pronator is great. It felt like running on clouds. However, the box toe is way to wide, the tongue is ridiculously large and bunches at the sides, the laces are not that great of a material and the shoes are loose at the ankles. I ran uphill for a mile in these and my feet were slipping all over the place. I normally buy a 1/2 size up for when my feet swell during a run, but these were just way too big.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product, very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I just love this shoe. My dog chewed it up, but while it lasted, I loved this shoe. Super comfortable whether for running, or just wearing for walking, it had great support, and the sole made it like you were walking on clouds! Loved the vibrant colors. Survived countless washes. Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Anna Worthington

customer_reviews.title: and On is the brand with which I'm happiest. They're stylish (but not obnoxious)
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several different running shoe brands throughout the years, and On is the brand with which I'm happiest. They're stylish (but not obnoxious), functional, durable, and reasonably priced (at least on Amazon). Good for training and racing. Highly recommended - love this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Sand-Buddha

customer_reviews.title: just love them!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the color, love the fit! I used ON shoes before until I wear them out, then changed to asics and I think it wasn't a very good choice for me as my feet stated to hurt and my timing increased as my stride wasn't right so now I'm back on with ON :). I could feel the difference from the moment I tried them on and started running again. I really recomend them, they fit as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Nany

customer_reviews.title: I may have found a new favorite brand of tennis shoes
customer_reviews.text: I may have found a new favorite brand of tennis shoes. They are comfy and they do seem to support me well. They also give me a little bounce in my step. They may run a bit large but my feet are tiny and everything seems large.
customer_reviews.author: Ali_8at

customer_reviews.title: Cloudster is the best running shoe
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing the cloudster for several years now and they changed my life! I had a severe treadmill injury while I was running and it injured my lower back. After a year of rehab I could not find a running shoe that provided me with enough support and just the right amount of cushion to not have pain. The cloudster provided all and I am still running! The only drawback is the bottom grooves tear quicker then they should, but at this price for a great running shoe, it’s not that big of a deal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes, they are lightweight and "springy" feeling. I usually don't run more than 6 miles at a time, but I can see how these would be helpful for those longer runs. Colors and design are very eye catching--I get a lot a compliments on the appearance of the shoe. If you are between sizes I would recommend sizing up 1/2 a size.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah D. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: ... shoes have so much spring to them and I love the color
customer_reviews.text: These shoes have so much spring to them and I love the color. I can tel a huge difference in my runs and how I feel when I wear these compared to regular running shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Geniusness0419

customer_reviews.title: The shoes were dirty..
customer_reviews.text: The shoes were dirty.... i am so upset but i took them out of the box and threw away the box and didn’t realize it until i went to wear them for the first time. I love the shoes but unhappy with the condition.
customer_reviews.author: Meggan Goodwin

customer_reviews.title: They’re perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this shoes! They’re the perfect size, they fit perfectly, they were delivered when it was expected! I am very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Guadalupe

customer_reviews.title: My new best running shoes.
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair and have had great success with them. Easy on the knees and hips
customer_reviews.author: NF

customer_reviews.title: Bounce in your step!!
customer_reviews.text: Comfy and unique. Warning these will put an amazing Bounce in your step!!
customer_reviews.author: melanie fischer

customer_reviews.title: The best purchase I have made in a long time!
customer_reviews.text: I'm thrilled with these shoes. I have joint issues due to hyper mobility and impact makes my issues worse. These shoes are amazing and somehow help with my joint stability. I have almost no impact pain in my knees while I wear these shoes too. I am officially an ON runner now!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Noisy!
customer_reviews.text: Noisy. Sounds as if I’m popping bubble wrap with each step!
customer_reviews.author: yougogirl

customer_reviews.title: Not like a cloud
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed with these shoes, they feel like cheap plastic on the bottoms. Dirt and mud stuck in the holes and they gave me shin splints after a few runs. Won't be buying this brand in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Don't last
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed the shoe until the loops on the bottom broke after only 5 months of wear. I used them 3-4 times a week on a treadmill.
customer_reviews.author: Angela M Yost

customer_reviews.title: Sole Felt Odd
customer_reviews.text: Sent these back. I found the sole to feel very odd and saw no way I'd ever get used to it.
customer_reviews.author: SoCalGal

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love love these shoes!!!! Will Defiantly be buying more of them !!
customer_reviews.author: mandy womack

customer_reviews.title: Comfort? Stylish? Great colors? These are for you!
customer_reviews.text: Sized up as suggested. Great shoe. Very stable and great for walking and gym. Wide toe box. Ordered second pair. Love that my stance is more erect in them.
customer_reviews.author: Martha Black

customer_reviews.title: Bounce!
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is my favorite running shoe from On thus far. I feel I have more bounce and that alone makes me want to run!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Hackett

customer_reviews.title: Too wide in the toe. I wish I could have tried on the different kinds to see if I could find a better model for me.
customer_reviews.text: I liked these, but there are pros and cons: Cons: because the material in the toe is so stretchy, the toes sort of wiggle all over. The toe is also wide, there is just too much room for a person with narrow feat. I tend to run on the opposite side of the road, near the ditch, and in these shoes I found my left toes curling as if I was trying to get a grip from slipping in the shoe, so the roominess made my runs slow and uncomfortable. I ended up getting blisters on the ends of my toes. Pros: Running up hills in these were awesome, they did feel light.
customer_reviews.author: Foxhouzer

customer_reviews.title: Feels like I'm walking on clouds:-)
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing running shoes. Though I've only tried them on at home, I could feel cool air transferring underneath my foot with each step. I'll now be getting rid of my fairly new Nike Shox! I highly recommend these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: C Ko

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe, great fit
customer_reviews.text: really does feel like you are walking on a cloud ... this is a great shoe ... and comes in tons of colors
customer_reviews.author: Laura R

customer_reviews.title: ON sneakers
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoe. True to size. One small criticism. .... they squeak quite loudly. Doesn't bother me, but some might find it annoying. It would not stop me from buying them again.
customer_reviews.author: Exercise Gal

customer_reviews.title: My thoughts.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't have the best instep support for my plantar fasciitis, or much cushioning on the inside bottom of the shoe, but the bottom offers cushioning for the ball of my foot, and the heel. They are over-priced though.
customer_reviews.author: peg

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Love them! Great for short & long runs. No need to break in w/1st try.
customer_reviews.author: NMC

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Love my shoes! ON will be the only brand I will buy in the future
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Best for Running
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend them for bootcamp style workouts. They are great for running though.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Spongy, literally feel like I’m running on clouds. Easy on the ball on my feet and my legs altogether.
customer_reviews.text: Spongy, literally feel like I’m running on clouds. Easy on the ball on my feet and my legs altogether.
customer_reviews.author: Navpreet B.

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit
customer_reviews.text: Love these new running shoes! Already put 25 miles on them.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the color & style. Just needed a bigger size!
customer_reviews.author: Marlo Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Little disappointed with these
customer_reviews.text: Little disappointed with these, they were super tight at the metatarsal front top part of my foot. Threw away the box and receipt so I couldn't return. Tried to stretch them with a shoe horn which worked but they kind of have a stiff movement in the sole. Wore them for work, they are not as good as my Brooks sneakers for 12 hours. Wore on treadmill - ok, still not as comfortable as my go to sneakers.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha

customer_reviews.title: Just purchased this pair October 2018
customer_reviews.text: Second pair that the barrel on the bottom sole split
customer_reviews.author: Robert S.

customer_reviews.title: This shoes are amazing!! I'm very happy to have bought it
customer_reviews.text: This shoes are amazing!! I'm very happy to have bought it. I can almost fly with it. Swiss engineer can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Smartbuyer

customer_reviews.title: I didn't need to size down
customer_reviews.text: I read reviews all around the internet that recommended to size down on this shoe. I am a solid 6.5 so I ordered a 6. Bad idea (for me). I have to return the 6 and reorder the 6.5. That said, they look amazing and when I tried them on they were comfortable, just too small. I can't wait to run in them.
customer_reviews.author: jksullycats

product_meta.title: ON Women's Cloudster
product_meta.description: The Women's On Cloudster has an innovative 4way-stretch upper material which offers an adaptive fit in all directions. The intelligent fabric reacts with a specific stretch to each foot movement. The Clouster has a CloudTec cushioning for a soft landing and firm push off. *Buy any full price ON footwear and if you are not completely satisfied with your purchase you can return them within 30 days, no questions asked, for an exchange or full refund.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars43 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
